description.brazilian: Fale com todos os personagens desenvolvedores no jogo
description.english: Talk to all developer characters in the game
description.german: Sprich mit allen Entwickler-Charakteren im Spiel.
description.japanese: ゲームで開発者のキャラクター全員と話す
description.latam: Habla con todos los personajes de los desarrolladores en el juego
description.russian: Поговорить со всеми персонажами разработчиков в игре.
description.schinese: 与游戏中所有开发者角色交谈

description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 40 moedas de uma vez
description.english: Have more than 40 coins at once
description.german: Besitze mehr als 40 Münzen auf einmal.
description.japanese: 一度に40コイン以上手に入れる
description.latam: Ten más de 40 monedas a la vez

displayName.japanese: 自分の居場所じゃない場所

description.german: Löse das Geheimnis um den Geist.

description.brazilian: Mate os insetos na casa abandonada
description.english: Kill the bugs in the abandoned house
description.german: Töte die Insekten im verlassenen Haus.
description.japanese: 廃墟になった家で虫を倒す
description.latam: Mata a los insectos de la casa abandonada
description.schinese: 杀死废弃房屋中所有的虫子

description.brazilian: Descobra o esconderijo dos caçadores de recompensas
description.japanese: 賞金稼ぎの隠れ家を見つける
description.schinese: 找到赏金猎人的藏身处

description.german: Freunde dich mit den Axolotl an.
description.japanese: アホロートルと友達になる

description.german: Erkämpfe dir Rang 10 in der Arena.
description.japanese: 闘技場でランク10になる
description.latam: Gana el décimo rango en la arena

description.english: Get yelled at by the donkey
description.japanese: ロバに大声で叫ばれる
description.russian: Сделать так, чтобы на вас накричал осел.

displayName.brazilian: A Fome É a Melhor Cozinheira

description.brazilian: Devolva o cordeiro para sua casa
description.german: Bring das Lamm wieder nach Hause.

description.brazilian: Descobra todos os segredos da masmorra
description.japanese: ダンジョンの秘密を全て解き明かす
description.latam: Descubre todos los secretos del calabozo
description.schinese: 发现地牢中所有的秘密

description.japanese: ドロップを3回連続で判断ミスをする
description.latam: Calcula mal una caída 3 veces diferentes
description.russian: Недооценить высоту в трех разных случаях.
description.schinese: 在不同的地方误判高度 3 次

description.brazilian: Deixe o viciado fazer o que viciados fazem
description.english: Let the junkie do his thing
description.german: Lass den Junkie sein Ding machen.
description.japanese: ジャンキーの好きにさせる
description.latam: Deja al adicto hacer lo suyo
description.schinese: 不去打扰沉迷刺激的家伙

description.japanese: 悲しんでるトラスゴを励ます
description.schinese: 让闷闷不乐的小妖精开心起来

description.japanese: 入植者にわいろを渡す

description.brazilian: Mate todos os insetos na mina de tetl
description.english: Kill all the bugs in the tetl mine
description.german: Töte alle Insekten in der Tetl-Mine.
description.japanese: テトル鉱山で全ての虫を倒す
description.latam: Mata a todos los insectos de la mina de tetl
description.russian: Убить всех жуков в тетлевой шахте.
description.schinese: 杀死绛石矿场中所有的虫子

description.brazilian: Dizime a população de duens na mina
description.japanese: 採石場に集まったホブを倒す
description.latam: Acaba con la población de hobs en la mina
description.schinese: 杀死盐矿场中所有的精怪

description.brazilian: Entregue a bola do menino Tuag
description.german: Bring dem Tuag-Kind den Ball zurück.
description.japanese: トゥアグの子供のボールを直す
description.latam: Recupera la pelota del niño tuag
description.russian: Вернуть мяч девочке из туагского племени.

description.brazilian: Compre um ingresso pras areias betuminosas
description.english: Buy a ticket to the oilsands
description.german: Kaufe eine Karte für die Ölsande.
description.japanese: 油砂行きの切符を買う
description.latam: Compra un boleto para las arenas oleosas

description.japanese: 環境アイテムで敵を10体倒す
description.latam: Mata a 10 enemigos con el entorno
description.russian: Убить 10 врагов с помощью окружающей среды.
description.schinese: 利用环境杀死 10 名敌人

description.english: Kill 5 enemies in the same turn
description.japanese: 同じターンで敵を5体倒す
description.latam: Mata a 5 enemigos en un turno
description.schinese: 一回合内消灭 5 名敌人

description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo que foi envenenado e atordoado
description.english: Kill an enemy that was poisoned and stunned
description.german: Töte einen Gegner, der vergiftet und betäubt war.
description.japanese: 毒とスタン状態の敵を倒す
description.latam: Mata a un enemigo envenenado y aturdido
description.schinese: 击杀中毒且晕眩的敌人

description.latam: Mata a 3 enemigos con una explosión
description.schinese: 一次爆炸消灭 3 名敌人

description.latam: Mata a 3 enemigos con una flecha

description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo com uma pedra
description.english: Kill an enemy with a rock
description.german: Töte einen Gegner mit einem Stein.
description.latam: Mata a un enemigo con una roca

description.english: Get kicked out of the arena
description.japanese: 闘技場から追い出される
description.latam: Haz que te expulsen de la arena
description.russian: Сделать так, чтобы вас выгнали с арены.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo com pouca Culpa
description.english: Finish the game with low guilt
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit wenigen Schuldgefühlen ab.
description.japanese: 罪悪感が低い状態でゲームをクリアする
description.latam: Termina el juego con poca culpa
description.russian: Завершить игру с низким чувством вины.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo com Culpa alta
description.english: Finish the game with high guilt
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit vielen Schuldgefühlen ab.
description.japanese: 罪悪感が高い状態でゲームをクリアする
description.latam: Termina el juego con mucha culpa
description.russian: Завершить игру с высоким чувством вины.

description.japanese: オベリスクを1つ解放する
オベリスクを2つ解放する
オベリスクを3つ解放する
トースターにイライラする
